bio: Slimamander hides his eye in one of his three mouths so that enemies have a hard time targeting that sensitive spot.

soultimate.name: Triple Trouble
soultimate.description: Hit foe with a barrage of hits for lots of damage.

skill.effect: Adds 35% of your Strength stat to your Spirit stat.
skill.name: Symbiotic Strengths

name: Slimamander
